title: 少年ジャックと魔法使い

search.original_title: 少年ジャックと魔法使い
search.overview: Jack is a boy who lives with his animal friends Barnaby Bear, Dinah Dog, Squeeker Mouse and Phineas Fox. He's challenged to a race with Allegra, who turns out to be a witch. She takes Jack to the queen witch, Auriana. She plans on turning all her slaves into evil harpies.
search.title: Young Jack and the Witch

title: サイボーグ009 怪獣戦争

search.original_title: サイボーグ００９ 怪獣戦争
search.overview: Cyborg 009 and his team are re-united to fight the latest menace from the Black Ghost. Before they can tackle their foe the team must overcome an army of monsters sent to stop them, including giant jellyfish, stingrays, plesiosaurs and treacherous cyborgs.
search.title: 人造人009：怪兽战争
